pageTitle: Patagonia Girls' Boardie Skirt | Desert Turquoise
textBeforeTable: Boys' and Girls' Sizing Information Fit Guide Size Chart Reviews We promote fair labor practices, safe working conditions and environmental responsibility throughout the Patagonia supply chain. Below are the suppliers that impact the Patagonia Girls' Boardie Skirt View our supply chain The Footprint Chronicles® Made in Vietnam. 82 g (2.9 oz) 4-ply, 4.2-oz 100% Supplex® nylon, with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish Fun print inset for visual appeal Single back pocket with snap closure and drain hole Fixed waistband with self-fabric gusset opening; double snaps secure opening; board short inspired flat-tie drawstring closure
